biotools.summary: The 3D Genome Viewer is a deskop application to view and explore 3D genome models from Hi-C data using virtual reality technology. The goal of 3DGV is to build fully immersive VR genome browser where the user can seamlessly interact.

bioschemas.name: 3D Genome Viewer (3DGV)
bioschemas.summary: The 3D Genome Viewer is a deskop application to view and explore 3D genome models from Hi-C data using virtual reality technology. The goal of 3DGV is to build fully immersive VR genome browser where the user can seamlessly interact.
